## Install

Uses `fp-ts` and `io-ts` as a peer dependency.

```bash
yarn add io-ts fp-ts arena-fp-ts
```

or

```bash
npm install io-ts fp-ts arena-fp-ts
```

## Usage

See [API Docs](https://arenadotio.github.io/arena-fp-ts/) for a list of modules.
